thread.title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers

title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers
text:
> Pennsylvania Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers San Diego Chargers quarterback Philip Rivers throws a pass against the Pittsburgh Steelers during the first half of an NFL football game Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in San Diego.
